channel.title: Docker Maven Integration Tests on alecharp's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Docker Maven Integration Tests on alecharp's blog

item.title: Docker and Maven for your integration tests
item.description: In the last weeks, I’ve been working on a side project to share pictures easily, outside of Face de bouc, as my mom used to say. But this is not the point. As a bad developer, I started quickly and so dirty: no tests of any kind. Then a friend came and offered some changes. Tests were needed. Do your tests, damn it! So first, I did some tests. The PR was about database insert in batch rather than in a Stream.
